home_banner: Technology helps build cutting edge solutions like ProMedRep
container_tittle: We are young and dynamic entrepreneurs with a vision to improve client and quality access to enhance pharma marketing strategies.
shadow_box_1: Enable healthcare providers to stay connected with pharma industry and manage their interviews virtually
shadow_box_2: Help pharma industry to optimize their efforts and enhance quality promotion of their products remotely with their clients
shadow_box_3: Create value for health care provider and the pharma industry
shadow_box_title: We built a digital platform to connect pharma companies to Doctors
shadow_box_4: The platform supports the goal of continues care for doctors and manages value for their time and access to pharma industry by providing virtual interface with pharma companies
shadow_box_5: The virtual platform also supports pharma industries, marketing and sales management functions and online management for better client engagement
footer: We are young and dynamic entrepreneurs with a vision to improve client and quality access to enhance pharma marketing strategies.

about_why_desc: Pharma industry and doctors need this because:
about_shadow_5: Pharma industry needs to be more assessable to Doctors, but at the same time does not disrupt doctor’s personal and professional time.
about_shadow_6: Variation in visit may compromise service to doctors
about_shadow_7: Staying on track with execution of strategies can be achieved though this digital platform
about_shadow_8: Geographical coverage of pharma marketing becomes easy
about_shadow_9: Increase number of pharma company visits by getting doctor’s undivided attention to establish efficient, convenient and responsive ways to communicate with doctors.
about_this_is_why: This is why the best way to meet the needs of pharma companies and doctors is enable them to meet securely and in a timely fashion
about_who_desc: The Promedrep platform has been built by a dedicated and committed team to change the traditional practices of pharma sales and marketing strategies.
